languages.text: {n}Абеляр морщится.{/n} "И снова Лорд-инквизитор позволяет себе помыкать Вольным Торговцем словно обычным слугой... не представляю, Лорд-капитан, как вы все еще это терпите".

{n}Abelard winces.{/n} "And once again, the Lord Inquisitor permits himself to treat the Rogue Trader as a common servant... It baffles me that you are still willing to put up with this audacity, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр морщится.{/n} "И снова Лорд-инквизитор позволяет себе помыкать Вольным Торговцем словно обычным слугой... не представляю, Лорд-капитан, как вы все еще это терпите".

{n}Abelard winces.{/n} "And once again, the Lord Inquisitor permits himself to treat the Rogue Trader as a common servant... It baffles me that you are still willing to put up with this audacity, Lord Captain."

languages.text: « Encore une fois, le seigneur inquisiteur se permet de traiter {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} comme {mf|un vulgaire serviteur|une vulgaire servante}, {n}dit Abélard en grimaçant.{/n} Je ne comprends pas pourquoi vous continuez à tolérer son impudence, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard winces.{/n} "And once again, the Lord Inquisitor permits himself to treat the Rogue Trader as a common servant... It baffles me that you are still willing to put up with this audacity, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « Encore une fois, le seigneur inquisiteur se permet de traiter {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} comme {mf|un vulgaire serviteur|une vulgaire servante}, {n}dit Abélard en grimaçant.{/n} Je ne comprends pas pourquoi vous continuez à tolérer son impudence, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: {n}Abelard verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Und erneut nimmt es sich der Großinquisitor heraus, {mf|den Freihändler wie einen gewöhnlichen Diener|die Freihändlerin wie eine gewöhnliche Dienerin} zu behandeln ... Es ist mir unbegreiflich, dass Ihr diese Unverfrorenheit weiterhin duldet, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard winces.{/n} "And once again, the Lord Inquisitor permits himself to treat the Rogue Trader as a common servant... It baffles me that you are still willing to put up with this audacity, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Und erneut nimmt es sich der Großinquisitor heraus, {mf|den Freihändler wie einen gewöhnlichen Diener|die Freihändlerin wie eine gewöhnliche Dienerin} zu behandeln ... Es ist mir unbegreiflich, dass Ihr diese Unverfrorenheit weiterhin duldet, Lord Captain."

languages.text: {n}Abelard hace un gesto de dolor.{/n} «Una vez más, el Lord Inquisidor trata a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente como si de un{mf||a} mer{mf|o|a} sirvient{mf|e|a} se tratase... Me sorprende que siga tolerando semejante osadía, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard winces.{/n} "And once again, the Lord Inquisitor permits himself to treat the Rogue Trader as a common servant... It baffles me that you are still willing to put up with this audacity, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard hace un gesto de dolor.{/n} «Una vez más, el Lord Inquisidor trata a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente como si de un{mf||a} mer{mf|o|a} sirvient{mf|e|a} se tratase... Me sorprende que siga tolerando semejante osadía, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは顔をしかめる。{/n}「またしても、ロード・インクィジターは自由開拓者をそこらの従者のように扱うわけですか…ロード・キャプテン、陛下がまだこの厚かましい態度を耐えておられることに困惑しています」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard winces.{/n} "And once again, the Lord Inquisitor permits himself to treat the Rogue Trader as a common servant... It baffles me that you are still willing to put up with this audacity, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは顔をしかめる。{/n}「またしても、ロード・インクィジターは自由開拓者をそこらの従者のように扱うわけですか…ロード・キャプテン、陛下がまだこの厚かましい態度を耐えておられることに困惑しています」

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德皱起了眉。{/n}“这已经不是第一次了，大审判官将行商浪人当成普通的仆人呼来喝去……您居然愿意继续容忍这种厚颜无耻的行为，这真的让我很诧异，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard winces.{/n} "And once again, the Lord Inquisitor permits himself to treat the Rogue Trader as a common servant... It baffles me that you are still willing to put up with this audacity, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德皱起了眉。{/n}“这已经不是第一次了，大审判官将行商浪人当成普通的仆人呼来喝去……您居然愿意继续容忍这种厚颜无耻的行为，这真的让我很诧异，舰长大人。”

languages.text: {n}Abelard yüz ekşitiyor.{/n} "Lord Engizisyoncu, bir kez daha Hür Tacir'e sıradan bir hizmetkâr gibi davranıyor... Kendisinin bu cüretine hâlâ tahammül ediyor olmanız beni şaşırtıyor Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard winces.{/n} "And once again, the Lord Inquisitor permits himself to treat the Rogue Trader as a common servant... It baffles me that you are still willing to put up with this audacity, Lord Captain."
